html:

How did u make just let me sleep on a pile of clothes so .......soothing? Is there a certain chord or what?

     Sorry im new to music

1.21.21  3:21 pm   What is your favorite chord progression?

1.21.21  2:01 pm   I might be about to go into panic mode. Do you have any advice for staying sensible / sane?

     Do you have any advice for compromises I might wish to consider?
1.21.21  1:29 pm   what is your favorite part about 3d animation?
1.21.21  1:16 pm   are you aiming for 'photo-realism' in your videos?
1.21.21  12:57 pm   is it bad i still have the lyrics from some of your songs stuck in my head even after two or three years
1.21.21  12:41 pm   in here comes the sun, at 1:10 on "and it's raging on", what are those chords called? I absolutely admire this part of the song.
1.21.21  12:40 pm   Why is the sun raging?
1.21.21  12:34 pm   What's your favorite song you made
1.21.21  12:21 pm   thoughts on square bagels
1.21.21  12:12 pm   What made you want to switch over to 3d styles in your music videos?

1.21.21  11:34 am   what font do you use in your videos
1.21.21  11:19 am   is love a good or bad thing?
1.21.21  10:57 am   what is the font you use in most of your videos
1.21.21  10:52 am   Why do you create such psychedelic music and music videos?

1.21.21  10:49 am   did you create anything during your technique-learning phase that you will paste right into a future video?

      or would you prefer to just do it again and maybe better?
1.21.21  10:47 am   how do you feel about caps lock
1.21.21  10:14 am   how do I embrace my weirdness?
1.21.21  9:44 am   In the gap between Might Quit and Here Comes the Sun how much time was spent learning and how much was spent actually making the video?

1.21.21  9:07 am   About a week ago someone I know passed away suddenly and I've been in a weird philosophical place since then (sort of like the beginning of Here Comes the Sun).  I know lots of your stuff is just jokes and gags but this one really spoke to me and made me realize that the everyone and everything is too amazing for me to be stuck like that for too long.  Life is what you make of it.  Thank you for this art and I'm so happy you've infiltrated the 3rd dimension.  PLEASE NEVER STOP.  

     now that im done with my rant, what's your favorite midi keyboard

      and how do you like your key action (heavy, light, etc)?
1.21.21  8:58 am   If I were to rhetorically analyze all your stuff would it be more funny deep or serious deep?
1.21.21  8:41 am   have you ever considered making a full length album

1.21.21  8:27 am   What genre is your music?

     Do you plan on changing things up?

1.21.21  8:20 am   What would you think about doing a live tour, post pandemic? with the tech available today there's so much you could do to incorporate your animations in to a live performance. Maybe that sounds like a nightmare to you. But the thought of being in a crowd singing along to your songs with your animation filling the room sounds amazing to me.
1.21.21  8:00 am   Where do you get the inspiration to make these type's of videos?

1.21.21  7:47 am   Are all of your songs written in 2010-2012?

      Or do you write songs on the later dates?

1.21.21  7:30 am   why don't you work on two schedules, the first being a strict weekly or every two weeks schedule (1-60 seconds videos that you can start and finish in less than 3 days,) and the other is a loose schedule based on either quantity or compromise, but the content needs more effort and production time for example (6 songs a year, or 4 songs and one long documentary, or however you choose to balance it,) won't that take away the pressure of taking a long "break" then feeling that you have to make something good.

     

P.S. The numbers here could either severely underestimate or overestimate the reality of the matter and the way/speed/quantity you can create and produce stuff, but I hope you get my overall point that two types of schedules could cancel the anxiety and negativity that comes from the other.
1.21.21  7:15 am   How to learn singing?

1.21.21  6:36 am   In "here comes the sun", what does it mean by "if this sing ain't good enough i'll erase it"? Do you mean since it's the first video to use blender you aren't sure if it is good and if people hate it you'll delete it or is it something else?
1.21.21  6:11 am   Why don't you use capital letters?

1.21.21  4:49 am   how many songs did you scrap or postpone between "might quit" and "here comes the sun" ?

     and are you planning on re-doing any "2d" song/video in fancy 3d?
1.21.21  3:53 am   when's the last time you typed a capital letter

1.21.21  3:48 am   Regarding the "wey o way" but in Hallelujah, would you please be able to roughly write out the rhythm u use for the vocal part? I can't figure out exactly how it's syncopated bc I have neglected my ear training for a while

sure
